CustomField.description: The API name, including namespace, of the field on the Milestone object you want to use as the total revenue for forecasted milestones. If left blank, the value in the Milestone Amount field is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API name, including namespace, of the field on the Milestone object you want to use as the total revenue for forecasted milestones. If left blank, the value in the Milestone Amount field is used.
CustomField.label: Total Revenue Field on Milestone
